get_new_address.description: webserver -> cashier RPC call to get a new deposit address for a given contract

username.description: the username for the new address to be signed to

get_current_address.description: webserver -> cashier RPC call to get the current deposit address for a given contract

username.description: the username for the new address to be signed to

get_deposit_instructions.description: webserver -> cashier RPC call to get deposit instructions for a given contract

rescan_address.description: administrator -> cashier RPC call to check an address again for deposits

process_withdrawal.description: administrator -> cashier RPC call to process a cash withdrawal

address.description: the withdrawal address we are dealing with

online.description: if true, the cashier should actually process the withdrawal on-line

cancel.description: if true, cancel the pending withdrawal and return funds to the relevant user

request_withdrawal.description: accountant -> cashier RPC call to request a cash withdrawal

username.description: the user who is going to withdraw the cash

address.description: where will the cash be going
